general.title: Daily Sadaqah
general.description: A special donation program that allows enrolled donors to automatically donate an agreed amount every day.

faq.question: Can I change my daily amount?
faq.answer: Yes, you can update your daily amount anytime from your account settings.

faq.question: Is there a minimum donation?
faq.answer: The minimum donation is $1.

general.extraInfo: Daily Sadaqah is a great way to build a habit of giving and maximize your impact.

general.title: Sadaqah Jariyah
general.description: Continuous charity that keeps giving even after you're gone, such as water wells, mosques, and schools.

faq.question: What qualifies as Sadaqah Jariyah?
faq.answer: Projects like wells, mosques, and schools qualify as Sadaqah Jariyah.

faq.question: Can I dedicate my donation?
faq.answer: Yes, you can dedicate your donation in honor of someone.

general.extraInfo: Sadaqah Jariyah projects continue to benefit people for years, multiplying your rewards.

general.title: Feed the Poor
general.description: Provide nutritious meals to those in need in communities around the world.

faq.question: Where are meals distributed?
faq.answer: Meals are distributed in regions with the greatest need, based on our field assessments.

faq.question: Can I sponsor a specific region?
faq.answer: You may request a region, and we will do our best to accommodate.

general.extraInfo: Feeding the poor is a highly recommended act of charity in Islam.

immediate.title: Support for Widows
immediate.description: Provide financial aid and support for widows and their families.

faq.question: How are funds distributed?
faq.answer: Funds are distributed directly to widows through vetted local partners.

faq.question: Can I get updates on beneficiaries?
faq.answer: We provide periodic updates via email and our website.

immediate.extraInfo: Supporting widows is a noble cause with great social impact.

immediate.title: Medical Treatment
immediate.description: Help fund critical medical care for those who cannot afford it.

faq.question: What treatments are covered?
faq.answer: Critical medical treatments such as surgeries, medications, and therapies are covered.

faq.question: Can I sponsor a patient?
faq.answer: Yes, you can sponsor a specific patient if you wish.

immediate.extraInfo: Medical treatment donations help those in dire need of healthcare.

immediate.title: Debt Relief
immediate.description: Help free those burdened by debt due to unforeseen circumstances.

faq.question: Who qualifies for debt relief?
faq.answer: Applicants are vetted for genuine need and unforeseen hardship.

faq.question: Is the process confidential?
faq.answer: All cases are handled with strict confidentiality.

immediate.extraInfo: Debt relief is a powerful way to help those in financial distress.

immediate.title: Support for Students
immediate.description: Help fund education for students from underprivileged backgrounds.

faq.question: What expenses are covered?
faq.answer: Tuition, books, and basic living expenses are covered.

faq.question: Can I sponsor a student?
faq.answer: Yes, you can sponsor a student directly.

immediate.extraInfo: Education support helps build a brighter future for communities.

periodic.title: Friday Sadaqah
periodic.description: Donate every Friday to maximize rewards on this blessed day.

faq.question: Can I change my weekly amount?
faq.answer: You can change your weekly donation amount anytime.

faq.question: Is Friday the only option?
faq.answer: Friday is recommended, but you may choose another day.

periodic.extraInfo: Friday Sadaqah is a special opportunity for increased blessings.

periodic.title: Monday & Thursday
periodic.description: Follow the Sunnah by giving Sadaqah on the days the Prophet ï·º recommended fasting.

faq.question: Can I choose other days?
faq.answer: You may select any day for your donation schedule.

faq.question: Is there a minimum amount?
faq.answer: The minimum is $1 per donation.

periodic.extraInfo: Giving on Mondays and Thursdays follows the Sunnah and increases blessings.

periodic.title: Monthly Sadaqah
periodic.description: Set up a regular monthly donation to provide consistent support.

faq.question: Can I pause my monthly donation?
faq.answer: You can pause or cancel your monthly donation anytime.

faq.question: Is there a contract?
faq.answer: No contract is required; you may stop anytime.

periodic.extraInfo: Monthly Sadaqah helps sustain ongoing charitable projects.

kafarat.title: Oath Atonement
kafarat.description: Expiation for breaking an oath in the name of Allah. Feed or clothe ten poor people or free a slave.

faq.question: How is the amount calculated?
faq.answer: The amount is based on local food/clothing costs for ten people.

faq.question: Can I pay in installments?
faq.answer: Yes, you may pay in installments if needed.

kafarat.extraInfo: Oath atonement is a prescribed way to seek forgiveness for broken oaths.

kafarat.title: Fasting Kafara
kafarat.description: Compensation for missed fasting days (for those unable to make them up) by feeding the poor.

faq.question: How many days can I pay for?
faq.answer: You may pay for as many missed days as required.

faq.question: Is there a deadline?
faq.answer: There is no strict deadline, but it is best to pay promptly.

kafarat.extraInfo: Fasting Kafara is a way to fulfill missed religious obligations.

kafarat.title: Fidyah
kafarat.description: Payment for those physically unable to fast due to illness, old age, or chronic condition.

faq.question: Who qualifies for Fidyah?
faq.answer: Those unable to fast due to illness or age qualify.

faq.question: Can I pay for someone else?
faq.answer: Yes, you may pay Fidyah on behalf of another.

kafarat.extraInfo: Fidyah is a compassionate solution for those unable to fast.

aqiqah.title: Aqiqah
aqiqah.description: Sacrifice offered on behalf of a newborn as a form of gratitude to Allah.

faq.question: How many animals are required?
faq.answer: Typically, two animals for a boy and one for a girl.

faq.question: Can I donate on behalf of someone else?
faq.answer: Yes, you may donate Aqiqah for another person.

aqiqah.extraInfo: Aqiqah is a beautiful tradition to celebrate new life.

aqiqah.title: Sacrifice (Qurbani)
aqiqah.description: Commemorate the devotion of Prophet Ibrahim (AS) and help feed the poor during Eid al-Adha.

faq.question: What animals can be sacrificed?
faq.answer: Sheep, goats, cows, and camels are acceptable.

faq.question: Can I choose the location?
faq.answer: You may request a location, subject to availability.

aqiqah.extraInfo: Qurbani is a major act of worship during Eid al-Adha.

aqiqah.title: Vow Fulfillment
aqiqah.description: Fulfill your vow (nadhr) made to Allah through charitable action.

faq.question: Can I specify the amount?
faq.answer: You may specify any amount for vow fulfillment.

faq.question: Is there a time limit?
faq.answer: There is no strict time limit, but fulfilling vows promptly is recommended.

aqiqah.extraInfo: Vow fulfillment is a way to honor promises made to Allah.

specific.title: Water Wells
specific.description: Provide access to clean water for communities suffering from water scarcity.

faq.question: Where are wells built?
faq.answer: Wells are built in communities suffering from water scarcity.

faq.question: Can I get updates on projects?
faq.answer: We provide updates and photos as projects progress.

specific.extraInfo: Water wells transform communities and save lives.

specific.title: Mosque Construction
specific.description: Help build a place of worship, learning, and community for Muslims.

faq.question: Can I dedicate a mosque?
faq.answer: Yes, you may dedicate a mosque in honor of someone.

faq.question: How long does construction take?
faq.answer: Construction time varies by location and project size.

specific.extraInfo: Mosque construction is a lasting legacy for generations.

specific.title: Educational Support
specific.description: Fund educational initiatives for underprivileged children and communities.

faq.question: What programs are funded?
faq.answer: Educational programs include tuition, supplies, and mentorship.

faq.question: Can I sponsor a child?
faq.answer: Yes, you can sponsor a child directly.

specific.extraInfo: Educational support helps build a brighter future for all.
